
### exit statuses 

```c
int main() {
    return 0;  /* or exit(0); */
}
```


### the status  {.smaller}


```c
#include <sys/wait.h>
...
waitpid(child_pid, &amp;status, 0);
if (WIFEXITED(status)) {
  printf("main returned or exit called with %d\n", WEXITSTATUS(status));
} else if (WIFSIGNALED(status)) {
  printf("killed by signal %d\n", WTERMSIG(status));
} else {
    ...
}
```

- "status code" encodes _both return value and if exit was abnormal_
- `W*` macros to decode it
